addListing(uint256[],uint256,address).details: Creates a new entry for a Listing object and transfers the Token to the contract

buy(uint256,bytes32[]).details: Transfers both the ERC20 token (price) and the NFT.

getOwnedCount(address,uint8).details: This function will return purchased count with tokenType

params._tokenType: Token Type (1 or 2), (1 is NB, 2 is GWB)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

removeListing(uint256).details: Marks Listing as not active object and transfers the Token back

removeWhitelistTokens(address[]).details: This will remove whitelisting of stable token for Lootbox trading

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setNotWhitelistPurchaseLimit((uint256,ui.details: This will set non-whitelist users limitation for GWB and NB

setWhitelistPurchaseLimit((uint256,uint2.details: This will set whitelist users limitation for GWB and NB

setWhitelistTokens(address[]).details: This will create whitelisting of stable token for Lootbox trading

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addListing(uint256[],uint256,address).notice: add a Listing to the Marketplace

removeListing(uint256).notice: Remove a Listing from the Marketplace

setNotWhitelistPurchaseLimit((uint256,ui.notice: Set the limitation for whitelisted and lucky users

setWhitelistPurchaseLimit((uint256,uint2.notice: Set the limitation for whitelist users
